briefDescription: Contains [[dimension]], used to create simple math-vectors and matrixes of other types.
detailedDescription:
Contains [[dimension]], used to create simple math-vectors and matrixes of other types.

Also defines all vectors from size 2-4, and all matrixes from size 2x2 to 4x4, for:
-float
-double
-int
-bool
These vectors and matrixes are named [element-type][size].
